title: House Industries' Tim Biskup Type?
content: I remember awhile back that House Industries mentioned they were working on a set of typefaces based on the work of Tim Biskup. I'm a big fan of his work and I wondered if anyone had heard if it's still being released. I haven't heard a peep about it for quite some time.
author: TBiddy

comments.content: I haven't heard anything either. IMO it's always best to contact the foundry directly with these types of inquiries.
Ken Barber was mentioning this project at the talk he had in Oslo earlier this week, but I can't recall him saying anything about when they expected to release it.
